2022 ANS Student Conference

Saving the World One Atom at a Time

ANS Student Conference 2022 Committee

For board members who wish to upload their photo, please upload with the convention of your first and last name (no capitals) and underscore bars between names to the ``img/members`` folder. Updating the link your profile leads to must be done in the code for this page (contact_us.html). Search your name in the code and there will be a place that says {insert link here}, then replace the {} in the quotes with your link.
